rotate_knob.description: Turn the knob in the appropriate direction to unlock the safe.

secure_door.description: Secure the safe by swinging the door to its closed position.

access_safe.description: Access the interior of the safe by swinging the door open.

confirm_closed.description: Making sure the safe door remains closed.

maintain_safe_body.description: Keep the safe body clean from dust or other particles.
